description:
If you had five minutes on stage what would you say? What if you only got 20 slides and they rotated automatically after 15 seconds? Would you pitch a project? Launch a web site? Teach a hack? Weâ€™re going to find out when we conduct our second Ignite event at OSCON.

Submit an Ignite OSCON talk – all submissions are due June 23.
title: Ignite OSCON
